cm.summary: Versatile software engineer with a passion for building effective tools and applications. My 9+ years of industry experience has equipped me with strong technical skills, and skills from my academic background set me apart from other engineers. Seeking a challenging position to learn new technologies and solve complex problems.

roles.title: Front End Web Developer
tasks: Responsible for delivering clean, accessible HTML structure and CSS styles from design wireframes in complex, high-performance e-commerce applications.
Served as liaison between Design/UX team and dev teams.
Lead developer for producing cutting-edge CSS styling rules and page layouts

Lead developer for adhering to accessibility guidelines and WAI-ARIA best practices. Proficient with JAWS. Assisted BA and QA teams in writing functional specifications and tests related to accessibility.
Remediated web applications built with older technologies to modern Javascript libraries and the Oracle JET framework. Created working prototypes and building block components for others to consume.
Organized SASS/CSS files in codebase. Wrote SASS compilation build scripts, HTML/CSS coding standards, technical documentation. Gave presentations on styling and accessibility.
Implemented systems for supporting bi-directional languages, internationalized strings, browser text zooming, icon fonts, cross-browser compatibility, and modern Flexbox and Grid layouts.

roles.title: Web Developer
tasks: Fixed bugs, implemented new functionality in UI, business, and database layers of enterprise C#.NET biobanking applications. Including: customized SSRS reports, complex client-side UI behaviors, refactoring database schema to accommodate shifting data relationships.

roles.title: Technical Support Engineer
tasks: Provided IT and technical support to clients. Performed deployments to client's staging/production servers. Wrote SQL scripts for deployment, correcting data entry errors, and removing protected health information.

roles.title: Product Manager
tasks: Gathered requirements, managed product release scope. Provided demos/training to clients.
Wrote software documentation, functional specifications, test scripts, and traceability matrices.
ArturAndTailors.com : Mobile-first, responsive layout. Database-driven photo gallery with rapid image navigation. Customized content management system. HTML5, CSS3, Javascript/jQuery, PHP, MySQL
TangoDeLosMuertos.com : Website, registration system, and on-site materials for international tango festival
MorenoTango.com: Website and registration forms for Argentine tango dance instruction and events

roles.title: Graduate Research Assistant
tasks: Wrote scripts, functions, and user interfaces for processing data and analyzing results.
Research examined turning locomotion in goats. Published research, presented at major conferences.
Teaching assistant in undergraduate biology courses. Strong communication, teaching, and organizational skills.

superuser.summary: I don't need a job because I am all powerful and I can do tons of cool stuff. For that matter, I can pay my bills with my laser eyes. Also, I can fly around and save people and stuff.
